name: Unit 4 (itch)
description:
UNIT 4 is The Corporation's miniaturisation technology department.

You have been miniaturised and injected into a patient's body. You must now escape.

Attack or evade roaming antibodies and make use of stray nano-bots you may find - these have unknown properties before first use, though they are all helpful.

It's better to head straight for the exit and dodge enemies where possible but if you kill all 5 on the level, you will receive a bonus health point when you exit.

Levels are procedurally generated and different each time you play.
